document.masterDocTitle: A cladistic analysis and reclassification of the tribe Bembicini (Hymenoptera: Crabronidae: Bembicinae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A cladistic analysis and reclassification of the tribe Bembicini (Hymenoptera: Crabronidae: Bembicinae)

subSubSection.paragraph: In summary, we subdivide the Bembicini in eight subtribes, based on the present cladistic analysis:

1 . Heliocausina Handlirsch 1925 . Included genera:
Acanthocausus
,
Heliocausus
,
Tiguipa
.

2 . Exeirina Dalla Torre 1897 . (= Argogorytina
Nemkov
and Lelej 1996
,
syn. nov.
). Included genera:
Argogorytes
,
Clitemnestra
,
Exeirus
,
Olgia
,
Neogorytes
,
Paraphilanthus
.

3 . Gorytina
Lepeletier de Saint Fargeau 1845
. (= Trichogorytina
Nemkov
and Pulawski 2009
,
syn. nov.
). Included genera:
Afrogorytes
,
Allogorytes
,
Arigorytes
,
Aroliagorytes , Austrogortyes
, † Biamogorytes ,
Eogorytes
,
Epigorytes
,
Gorytes
,
Hapalomellinus
,
Harpactostigma , Harpactus
,
Hoplisoides
,
Lestiphorus
,
Leurogorytes
,
Liogorytes
,
Megistommum
,
Oryttus
,
Psammaecius
,
Psammaletes
,
Pterygorytes
,
Sagenista
,
Saygorytes
,
Stenogorytes
,
Stethogorytes
,
Tretogorytes
,
Trichogorytes
,
Xerogorytes
.

4 . Spheciina Nemkov and Ohl , subtrib. nov. Included genera:
Ammatomus
,
Kohlia
,
Sphecius
,
Tanyoprymnus
.

Diagnosis. Inner eye margins nearly parallel or converging toward clypeus, ocelli not depressed below level of surrounding surface of vertex, midocellar lens not reduced to a scar, labrum exposed part nearly half as long as broad, posterolateral oblique scutal carina present, scutellum overlapping metanotum, forewing submarginal cell I with prestigmal length much more than length of wing beyond marginal cell, stigma minute.

5 . Handlirschiina
Nemkov
and Lelej 1996
. Included genera:
Handlirschia
,
Pterygorytes
.

6 .
Stizina A. Costa
1859
.
Included genera: Bembecinus , Stizoides
,
Stizus
.

7 . Stictiellina
Bohart
and Horning 1971
, stat. resurr. Included genera:
Chilostictia
,
Glenostictia
,
Microstictia
,
Steniolia
,
Stictiella
,
Xerostictia
.

8 .
Bembicina
Latreille 1802
. Included genera:
Bembix
,
Bicyrtes
,
Carlobembix
,
Editha
,
Hemidula
,
Microbembex
,
Rubrica
,
Selman
,
Stictia
,
Trichostictia
,
Zyzzyx
.

paragraph.keyLead: 1 Inner eye margins distinctly converging above..................................................... Heliocausina
- Inner eye margins nearly parallel or converging toward clypeus................................................ 2
5 Forewing submarginal cell I with prestigmal length not more than length of wing beyond marginal cell....... Handlirschiina
- Forewing submarginal cell I with prestigmal length much more than length of wing beyond marginal cell............... 6
6 Labrum prominent, exposed part nearly half as long as broad............................................. Stizina
- Labrum markedly prominent, exposed part at least as long as broad.............................................. 6

7 Ocelli depressed below level of surrounding surface of vertex; midocellar lens present, elongate, oval, sometimes medially indented..................................................................................... Stictiellina

- Ocelli not depressed below level of surrounding surface of vertex; midocellar lens reduced to a scar, at most with traces of a lens........................................................................................ Bembicina
